name: Retro Space Shooter (itch) (BrickMaverick)
description:
A beautiful, retro shooter where you must defeat incoming enemies with your mecha transforming spaceship. Huge boss included!

It’s almost monochrome shooting game.To make the game more transparent, additional colors have been added (enemy shots and background).

Game details:
- 18 supreme beautiful levels
- 3 difficulty levels
- Many enemies and bosses
- Fast action
- Plane upgrades
- Amazing explosion effects
- Many particles
- Simple controls
- Satisfy hardcore gamers and casual players

How to play:
Game support relative touch control. When you move your finger on the screen ship moves identical (screen slide = move plane).
Probably this is the best steering on touch screens! Try it!
